title: Geraiyeh
text: Geraiyeh (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Gerā’īyeh and Garā‘īyeh) is a village in <a href="Gheyzaniyeh%20Rural%20District">Gheyzaniyeh Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Ahvaz%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Ahvaz%20County">Ahvaz County</a>, <a href="Khuzestan%20Province">Khuzestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 151, in 27 families.
